metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3863 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple integer overflows in the Blob class in keystore/keystore.cpp in Keystore in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48M allow attackers to execute arbitrary code and read arbitrary Keystore keys via an application that uses a crafted blob in an insert operation, aka internal bug 22802399.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> need to check if used sbeattie> incorrect check for Blob max length

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
